heading: Professional mediation
information:
**You could get up to £500 towards family mediation**

7 out of 10 families using mediation resolve their issues without having to go to court.  
Find out more about the [family mediation voucher scheme](https://www.gov.uk/guidance/family-mediation-voucher-scheme?utm_source=CAIT&utm_campaign=mediation_vouchers).
lede: Mediation sessions are run by professionals who help you try to reach an agreement without going to court.
lede_additional: Mediation isn’t relationship counselling and you don’t have to be in the same room as the other parent.
pros: it’s quicker than court in most cases
can be cheaper than using a lawyer
summary_lede: Mediation sessions are run by professionals who help you try to reach an agreement without going to court. It isn’t relationship counselling and you don’t have to be in the same room as the other parent.
usp: You both want to reach an agreement but need help from someone who is independent.
